title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements for drone transportation of renewable energy materials in challenging environments.

title: Design Drone Hardware for Energy Transportation
description: Design the drone hardware capable of transporting energy materials in challenging environments.

title: Design Energy Storage System for Drones
description: Design an energy storage system for the drones to transport energy materials effectively.

title: Design Drone Navigation System for Challenging Environments
description: Design a navigation system for the drones to operate effectively in challenging environments.
dependencies: Design Drone Hardware for Energy Transportation

title: Implement Drone Hardware Design
description: Implement the hardware design for the drones according to the specified requirements.
dependencies: Design Drone Hardware for Energy Transportation

title: Implement Energy Storage System Design
description: Implement the energy storage system design according to the specified requirements.
dependencies: Design Energy Storage System for Drones

title: Implement Drone Navigation System Design
description: Implement the navigation system design for the drones in challenging environments.
dependencies: Design Drone Navigation System for Challenging Environments

title: Test Drones in Controlled and Challenging Environments
description: Conduct tests on the drones to ensure they can operate effectively in both controlled and challenging environments.

title: Deploy Drones for Real-World Testing
description: Deploy the drones for real-world testing in challenging environments to validate their capabilities.
dependencies: Test Drones in Controlled and Challenging Environments

title: Review Project Documentation
description: Review all project documentation to ensure it is accurate, up-to-date, and ready for public release.
dependencies: Design Drone Hardware for Energy Transportation
Design Energy Storage System for Drones
Design Drone Navigation System for Challenging Environments
